alert.note: Alert for Collin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 1:34PM CDT until October 29 at 3:01PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... East Fork Trinity River At McKinney affecting Collin County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork Trinity River at McKinney. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will begin along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 16.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
